snippet.title: Against the Storm - Gameplay Trailer | PAX Online East
snippet.description:
Against the Storm - Royal Woodlands Demo available:
https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/against-the-storm--royal-woodlands-demo 

Wishlist the game on Epic Games Store:
https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/against-the-storm 

Play the new demo of a roguelite city builder set in a world where it never stops raining. As the Scorched Queen's viceroy, manage settlements inhabited by intelligent beavers, lizards, and humans.

📃 Read the full announcement:
http://eremitegames.com/important-update/ 

📣 Follow us for updates:
https://linktr.ee/against_the_storm
